casebody.data:
[Grafton,

June, 1882.] State v. Collins. Attachment, for the violation of an injunction. Facts found by the court. Pike Parsons, for the state. Burleigh ¿f Adams, for the defendant. Stanley, J.

Evidence of the defendant’s intent, in mitigation of penalty, will be heard at the trial term.

Case discharged.

Allen and Carpenter, JJ., did not sit: the others concurred.
